name: Lich
languages: Common plus up to five other languages

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.description: DC 18 CON save or paralyzed for 1 minute; repeat save at end of each turn.

legendaryActions.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: Creature within 10 ft. makes DC 18 WIS save or frightened 1 minute (repeat saves end of turns; 24-hour immunity on success).

legendaryActions.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: Non-undead within 20 ft. make DC 18 CON save, taking 21 (6d6) necrotic on failure, half on success.
